definition: stoping (excavating ore using stepped terraces)/to extract ore/extraction/to pull back
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
to pick/to pluck/to collect/to select/to choose/to gather
color/complexion/looks/variant of 彩[cai3]/variant of 採|采[cai3]

sentences.english: This paper described briefly the stoping work of remnant orebody in accumulative manganese deposits.
sentences.chinese: 本文简介了堆积型锰矿床残矿体的回采工作。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, almost all adjacent filling bodies have been damaged with poor mining security.
sentences.chinese: 相邻充填体几乎均发生压坏现象，进路回采安全性差。

sentences.english: Excellent results were obtained in mining of pillars using tailings in horizontal cut-and-fill.
sentences.chinese: 用尾砂分层充填法回采矿柱，取得了很好的经济效果。

sentences.english: It will lay the better foundation for practice of extraction plan.
sentences.chinese: 为回采方案的实施打下了良好的基础。

sentences.english: The paper introduced the blasting design for recovery of the crown pillar in detail.
sentences.chinese: 文中较详细地介绍了该顶柱回采的爆破设计。

sentences.english: The stabilization of side coal-walls is the key to guarantee the stability of surrounding rock when the lower slicing method is used.
sentences.chinese: 两帮稳定是保证下分层回采巷道围岩整体稳定的关键。

sentences.english: The recovery was improved from 65 percent to 79 percent.
sentences.chinese: 矿石回采率大幅提高，由原来的65%提升到79%。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the method of slope adjustment of stope face.
sentences.chinese: 文章介绍了回采工作面的调斜方法。

sentences.english: A new anchor applied to the stoping tunnel supporting of coal mine is recommended.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种用于煤矿回采巷道支护的新型锚杆。

sentences.english: At the same time, the method is worth referring to by sill pillars extraction in other mines.
sentences.chinese: 同时也为其他矿山底柱的回采提供了宝贵的经验。

sentences.english: This paper makes an approach to the reasonable design of working section recovery.
sentences.chinese: 作者就合理设计采区回采率的问题进行了探讨。

sentences.english: Therefore, the upward drift stoping with backfilling is decided to use.
sentences.chinese: 为此决定采用上向进路充填法进行回采。

definition: waste rock (mining)/gangue (worthless minerals mixed in with coal or ore)
mining waste/waste remaining after processing ore/tailings
vertical shaft (for mining, ventilation systems etc)
